title: 147: How the Doshas Deal with Loneliness During the Holidays with Sahara Rose
itunes:title: 147: How the Doshas Deal with Loneliness During the Holidays with Sahara Rose
description:
Many of us experience loneliness during the holidays—but it isn’t all the same. In this episode, I share how each Dosha deals with loneliness differently—and what you can do about it.

Get your “Do Your Dharma”, “Vata AF,” “Pitta AF,” and “Kapha AF” tanks over at sahararosemerch.shopify.com. They make awesome holiday gifts and are great reminders to help you do your dharma (purpose) and embody the three Doshas!

Get your questions answered by me each week in my new Youtube show, Ask Sahara. From “what is my purpose” to “what do I do if I’m a cross between two Doshas” to “how do I manifest the one?” I’ve got your most pressing questions answered. Subscribe at youtube.com/sahara.
